participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, with a passion for space and exploration.
participant_1.background: Penn and Teller are my favorite magicians. I want to be an astronaut when I grow up. My two dogs are the best friends a girl could have. I love lasagna like I'm Garfield. I have a poster of Neil Tyson DeGrasse on my wall.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Friendly and supportive, enjoys family time and has a love for classic movies.
participant_2.background: My favorite movie is Titanic. I am from Sterling Heights, Michigan. I work part time at Aldi's. I have two kids, ages 2 and 6.

content.text: I'm an astronaut in training!
That's awesome! What got you into that?
I've always been fascinated by space, and I think it would be amazing to explore it.
I agree! It would be so cool to see the Earth from space.
It would be! I can't wait to experience it.
When do you think you'll be ready to go into space?
It's hard to say. It takes a lot of training and preparation, but I'm working hard to get there.
I'm sure you'll do great!
Thanks! I appreciate that.
So, what else do you like to do?
I love to read, watch movies, and spend time with my friends and family.
Me too! What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like a lot of different types of movies, but I'm especially into science fiction and fantasy.
Me too! I love those genres.
What's your favorite movie?
It's hard to say, but I think my favorite is probably Titanic.
Titanic is a great movie! I love the story.
Me too! It's so romantic.
So, what do you do for a living?
I work part time at Aldi's.
Oh, cool! I've never been to Aldi's before.
It's a great grocery store! They have really good prices.
I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'll like it.
